meanings.definition: A hypothetical collection of multiple universes.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study the multiverse to understand different possible realities.
meanings.sent2: The idea of a multiverse suggests the existence of countless other worlds.
meanings.sent3: In the multiverse, there could be a universe where everyone has superpowers!
meanings.sent4: Exploring the multiverse is like diving into a sea of endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The multiverse is like a cosmic library with infinite books of existence.

meanings.definition: The concept of an infinite number of parallel universes.
meanings.sent1: The multiverse theory proposes the existence of parallel realities.
meanings.sent2: Imagining a multiverse can expand our perception of the cosmos.
meanings.sent3: If the multiverse is real, maybe there's a universe where time flows backward!
meanings.sent4: The multiverse is a tapestry of universes woven together in the fabric of space.
meanings.sent5: Contemplating the multiverse feels like gazing at a sky full of endless stars.
